root.name: Vs. Clu Clu Land
root.description: This version of Clu Clu Land was released for Nintendo's Versus series arcade hardware as Vs. Clu Clu Land. It also received a home release in Japan under the name Clu Clu Land D.This game is one of several NES-era games that Nintendo embedded into its town-and-life simulator, Animal Crossing. However, it is not obtainable during the normal course of play and only shows up if the player enters a specific 30-character password.
